raw_desc: Balanced hydration: Enjoy quality hydration with low sodium and balanced minerals for a unique taste. Mai Dubai Bottled Water is low in sodium and carefully filtered for pure, refreshing hydration. Conscious Choice: Produced in the UAE’s largest solar-powered water plant, where 100% of the manufacturing is run on pure solar energy. Fully Automated Facility: Crafted using advanced technology under the highest hygiene and safety standards for guaranteed quality in every sip. Ergonomic Bottle: Tailored for every moment, whether you're heading to the gym, at your desk, traveling, practicing wellness, or outdoor adventures. Sustainability Commitment: Mai Dubai is a pioneer in sustainable and energy efficiency in the UAE. Leading the way in sustainability with efforts to reduce plastic waste and support the UAE's energy efficiency goals.
